metadata.Plot: The Midnight Taxi is a 1928 early part-talkie thriller picture from Warner Bros. directed by John G. Adolfi and starring Antonio Moreno, Helen Costello and Myrna Loy. It is unknown whether a sound copy survives, but a silent copy with no talking is in the care of the British Film Institute. The silent print runs just under 50 minutes. According to the Library of Congress, the film survives in British Film Institute's National Film and Televiion Archive.
metadata.Writer: Freddie Foy, Harvey Gates, Joseph Jackson
metadata.Actors: Antonio Moreno, Helene Costello, Myrna Loy
